summary: The raster package supplies highâ€‘level Python wrappers around GDAL raster datasets and their bands, allowing Django GIS projects to read raster data, access band properties, perform I/O, compute statistics, and manage spatial reference information and coordinate transformations.
business_intent: To simplify integration of geospatial raster imagery into Django applications by abstracting GDAL complexities, enabling developers to query, manipulate, and analyze raster datasets within the Django GIS framework.
